plays.text: Penalty to Steve Rucchin 2 minutes for High Sticking Martin Havlat
Penalty to Patric Kjellberg 2 minutes for Holding Wade Redden
Goal scored by Marian Hossa assisted by Radek Bonk and Zdeno Chara
Penalty to Peter Schaefer 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Ruslan Salei
Penalty to Keith Carney 2 minutes for Holding Todd White
Penalty to Zdeno Chara 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Rob Valicevic
Goal scored by Marian Hossa unassisted
Penalty to Martin Havlat 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Shaun Van Allen 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Matt Cullen
Goal scored by Stanislav Chistov assisted by Patric Kjellberg and Jason Krog
Goal scored by Daniel Alfredsson unassisted
